name: freepbx-ssl-dev-server
description: SSL Development Server for FreePBX VoIP Platform

scripts.setup-ssl: openssl req -x509 -newkey rsa:4096 -keyout storage/ssl/key.pem -out storage/ssl/cert.pem -days 365 -nodes -subj '/C=US/ST=CA/L=San Francisco/O=FreePBX VoIP/OU=Development/CN=freepbx-dev.local'

author: FreePBX VoIP Platform
